faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Agent Skills
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team

items.question: What is Antigravity Skills?
items.answer: Antigravity Skills is a skill creation platform built on the Agent Skills open standard. Skills you create can be used across platforms including Cursor, Claude Code, and more.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: There are two ways to get started on Antigravity Skills: 1) Browse our curated skill library and download ready-to-use skills; 2) Use AI Skill Builder to generate custom skills with one click.

items.question: What tools are compatible?
items.answer: Skills created on Antigravity Skills follow the Agent Skills open standard, making them compatible with Cursor, Claude Code, Antigravity, OpenAI Codex, and all other tools that support the specification.

items.question: How do Skills improve my workflow?
items.answer: Expert-level skills work plug-and-play. No need to repeatedly explain context ‚Äî AI delivers high-quality output on the first response.

items.question: Can I create my own Skills?
items.answer: Yes! Use Antigravity Skills' AI Skill Builder to describe what you need and generate a SKILL.md that follows the open standard. Works with any compatible platform.

items.question: How are Skills curated?
items.answer: Antigravity Skills community skills are validated through 3-source cross-checking (cursor.directory + GitHub Stars + Reddit) to ensure quality.

items.question: Is Antigravity Skills affiliated with Anthropic?
items.answer: No, Antigravity Skills is an independent project. We build on the Agent Skills open standard (initiated by Anthropic), but we have no affiliation with Anthropic.

items.question: Is Antigravity Skills free?
items.answer: Browsing and downloading community skills is completely free. The AI Skill Builder offers free trials, with credits required for continued use.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your First Skill?
